title: Prioritize Recommendations
description: Given a list of strategic recommendations, an agent must prioritize them using an Impact/Effort matrix.

tasks.description: For each recommendation, assign a score for 'Potential Impact' (1-5) and 'Implementation Effort' (1-5).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assigns a reasonable score to each recommendation.

tasks.description: Categorize each recommendation into one of four quadrants: 'Quick Wins' (High Impact, Low Effort), 'Major Projects' (High Impact, High Effort), 'Fill-ins' (Low Impact, Low Effort), and 'Thankless Tasks' (Low Impact, High Effort).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly categorizes all recommendations based on their scores.

tasks.description: Generate a report listing the recommendations, starting with the 'Quick Wins'.
